description:
Our bright, clean, and modern one-bedroom apartment is located in the heart of Williamsburg, Brooklyn. Conveniently situated near the J,M,Z,L and G trains, you'll find yourself in one of the coolest neighborhoods in New York with easy access to Manhattan. Great for couples, solo, and business travelers alike -- enjoy the privacy of our apartment, cook your own meals, and feel at home while on the road.

If you're interested in staying, please feel free to "Contact Host" below!

Our home is your home!

Our rooftop deck is also available.

We're walking distance to multiple subway stations: Hewes (J,M,Z), Lorimer (L), Broadway (G) and Metropolitain (G) that give you access to Manhattan and other parts of Brooklyn.

We prefer to host guests who have have verified ID, existing reviews and/or references. If you don't have existing reviews, send us a note and tell us about yourself!
name: Very Bright and Spacious 1BR in Williamsburg
review: Our stay was just great. Perfect location, quiet, safe and within a short walking distance from the subway. The apartment was clean, well equipped and cozy. Kirk definitely took the opportunity to make use feel at home: he was extremely responsive, attentive and made sure everything went smoothly, I definitely recommend him as a host. It was my first time using Airbnb but won't be my last based on this experience. Thank you Kirk!
